title: The life and death of James Arminius and Simon Episcopius, professors of divinity in the University of Leyden in Holland both of them famous defenders of the doctrine of Gods universal grace, and sufferers for it / now published in the English tongue.
author: Bertius, Petrus, 1565-1629.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliff and Nath. Thompson for Francis Smith ...,
